owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: Ontología para el Catálogo de Recursos Lingüísticos de ReTeLe (http://catalogo.retele.linkeddata.es/) a partir de Metashare.owl (http://purl.org/net/def/metashare)

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on how the resource has already been used.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: actual use info
información de uso

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on organization to whomtheperson is affiliated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: affiliation
afiliación

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A bibliographic reference or ms:httpURI link to the annotation manual.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: annotation manual
manual de anotación

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the annotators of the specific annotation type.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: annotator
anotador

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The name of the character encoding used in the resource or accepted by the tool/service
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: character encoding
codificación de caracteres

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on character encoding of the resource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: character encoding info
información de codificación de caracteres

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the external classification schemes.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: conformance to classification scheme
según esquema de clasificación
Groups together information on corpora of all media types.
corpus info
información del corpus

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies whether the resource is created automatically or in manual or interactive mode.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: creation mode
modo de creación

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the medium (channel) used for delivery or providing access to the resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: distribution access medium
medio de acceso o distribución

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on a person or an organization that holds the distribution rights. The range and scope of distribution rights is defined in the distribution agreement. The distributor in most cases only has a limited licence to distribute the work and collect royalties on behalf of the licensor or the IPR holder and cannot give to any recipient of the work permissions that exceed the scope of the distribution agreement (e.g. to allow uses of the work that are not defined in the distribution agreement).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: distribution rights holder
propietario de los derechos de distribución

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on domains represented in the resource; can be repeated for parts of the resource with distinct domain
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: domain info
información de dominio

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Information on the contents of the lexicalConceptualResource as regards the linguistic level of analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: ecoding level
nivel de codificación

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A bibliographical record of or link to a report describing the evaluation process, tool, method etc. of the tool or service.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: evaluation record
informe de evaluación

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on person or organization that evaluated the tool or service.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: evaluador
evaluator

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The unit of the extratextual information contained in the lexical conceptual resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: extra textual information unit
unidad de información no textual

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An indication of the extratextual information contained in the lexicalConceptualResouce; can be used as an alternative to audio, image, videos etc. for cases where these are not considered an important part of the lcr.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: extra textual information
información no textual

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the use for which the resource is created.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: foreseen use info
información del uso previsto del recurso

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the project that has funded the resource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: funding project
proyecto financiador

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A person or an organization who holds the full Intellectual Property Rights (Copyright, trademark etc) that subsist in the resource. The IPR holder could be different from the creator that may have assigned the rights to the IPR holder (e.g. an author as a creator assigns her rights to the publisher who is the IPR holder) and the distributor that holds a specific licence (i.e. a permission) to distribute the work via a specific distributor.

Groups information on a person or an organization who holds the full Intellectual Property Rights (Copyright, trademark etc) that subsist in the resource. The IPR holder could be different from the creator that may have assigned the rights to the IPR holder (e.g. an author as a creator assigns her rights to the publisher who is the IPR holder) and the distributor that holds a specific licence (i.e. a permission) to distribute the work within the META-SHARE network.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: IPR holder
titular de DPI

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of the language description.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: language description type
tipo de gramática

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the languages represented in the resource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información de las lenguas del recurso
language info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on language varieties occurred in the resource (e.g. dialects)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información de las variedades del recurso
language variety info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the type of the language variety that occurs in the resource or is supported by a tool/service
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: language variety type
tipo de variedad de la lengua
información de los ficheros de audio del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource audio info
información de las imágenes del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource image info
información de la parte multimedia del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource media part info
información de los textos del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource text info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the subtype of lexicalConceptualResource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: lexical conceptual resource type
tipo de recurso léxico conceptual
información de los vídeos del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource video info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the resource includes one, two or more languages
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: clasificación por número de lenguas
linguality type

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A more detailed account of the linguistic information contained in the lexicalConceptualResource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información lingüística
linguistic information

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The conditions imposed by the user being member of some association/institution (e.g., ELRA, LDC) distributing the resource. This indicates the availability conditions (and prices) for users who are members or not.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información de afiliación
membership info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on organizations related to the resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información de la organización
organization info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information relevant to persons related to the resource; to be used mainly for contact persons, resource creators, validators, annotators etc. for whom personal data can be provided.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información de la persona
person info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Information on the recorder(s) of the audio or video part of the resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: grabadora
recorder
registrador

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the relations of the resource being described with other resources.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información de relaciones
relation info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the size of resource parts per domain.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: size per domain
tamaño por dominio

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Provides information on the size per language component.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: size per language
tamaño por lengua

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: size unit
unidad de medida del tamaño

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on text type/genre of the resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información de la clasificación de los textos
text classification info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the text format(s) of a resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información del formato de texto
text format info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the type of documentation for tool or service.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: tipo de documentación de herramientas y servicios
tool documentation type

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups together elements required for the description of tools and services.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información de herramientas y servicios
tool service info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Reports on the research papers documenting the usage of a resource, either in a structured form or in free text.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: informe de uso
usage report

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The conditions imposed by the nature of the user (for instance, a research use may have different implications depending on this).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: naturaleza del usuario
user nature

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on validation of a resource; it can be repeated to allow for different validations (e.g. formal validation of the whole resource; content validation of one part of the resource etc.).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: información de validación
validation info

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A short account of the validation details or a link to the validation report.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: informe de validación
validation report

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the person(s) or the organization(s) that validated the resource.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: validador
validator

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name or the identifier or the url of the tool used to access a resource (e.g. a corpus workbench).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: access tool
herramienta de aceso

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The text that must be quoted for attribution purposes when using a resource.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: attribution text
texto de la atribución

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A first indication of type of sounds recorded.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: audio genre
genéro de los ficheros de audio

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name of the country mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization as defined in the list of values of ISO 3166.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: country
país

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The date in which the creation process was completed
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: creation end date
fecha de finalización de la creación

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Provides further information on the creation methods and processes.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: creation mode details
detalles del método de creación

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The date in which the creation process was started
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: creation start date
fecha de inicio de creación

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name, the identifier or the url of the tool used in the creation process linked component.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: creation tool
herramienta de creación

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name of the department or unit (e.g. specific university faculty/department, department/unit of a research organization or private company etc.).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: department name
nombre del departamento

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Provides information on documents that report on the resource in form of free text.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: document unstructured
información no estructurada

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the application domain of the resource or the tool/service
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: domain
dominio

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The email address of a person or an organization
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: correo electrónico
email
email

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Any url where the service providing access to a resource is being executed.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: execution location
localización de la ejecución

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Another resource to which the lexicalConceptualResource is linked (e.g. link to a wordnet or ontology).
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: external ref
referencia externa

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A first indication of the genre of images.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: género de las imágenes
image genre

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The International Standard Serial Number used to identify a journal.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ISSN
Número Internacional Normalizado de Publicaciones Seriadas
issn

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A human understandable name of the language that is used in the resource or supported by the tool/service; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: language name
lengua
nombre de la lengua

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the writing system used to represent the language in form of a four letter code as it is defined in ISO-15924
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: sistema de escritura

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name of the language variety that occurs in the resource or is supported by a tool/service
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: language variety name
nombre de la variedad de la lengua
variedad de la lengua

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An unambiguous referent to the resource within META-SHARE.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: META-SHARE ID
identificador en META-SHARE

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The mime-type of the resource which is a formalized specifier for the format included or a mime-type that the tool/service accepts; value to be taken from a subset of the official mime types of the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (http://www.iana.org/)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: MIME type
tipo MIME

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The full name of an organization.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: nombre de la organización
organization name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The short name (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used for an organization.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: abreviatura del nombre de la organización
nombre abreviado de la organización
organization short name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name, the identifier or the url of the original resources that were at the base of the creation process of the resource.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: original source
recurso fuente

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name of the region, county or department as mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: region
región

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Refers to another resource that the resource described uses for its operation.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: recurso vinculado con
resource associated with

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The short form (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used to identify the resource; the element can be repeated for the different language versions using the "lang" attribute to specify the language.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: abreviatura del nombre del recurso
resource short name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Provides an account of the revisions in free text or a link to a document with revisions.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: revision
revisión

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A url with samples of the resource or, in the case of tools, of samples of the output.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: localización de las copias
samples location

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the SizeUnit measurement in form of a number
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: size
tamaño

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The conventionalized discourse of the content of the resource, based on extra-linguistic and internal linguistic criteria; the values here are intended only for speech.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: género de los archivos de voz
speech genre

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The telephone number of a person or an organization; recommended format: +_international code_city code_number.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: número de teléfono
telephone number

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Genre: The conventionalized discourse or text types of the content of the resource, based on extra-linguistic and internal linguistic criteria.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: género de los textos
text genre

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the theoretic model applied for the creation or enrichment of the resource, and/or reference (URL or bibliographic reference) to informative material about the theoretic model used.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: modelo teórico
theoretic model

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the frequency with which the resource is updated.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: frecuencia de actualización
update frequency

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A URL used as homepage of an entity (e.g. of a person, organization, resource etc.) and/or where an entity (e.g.LR, document etc.) is located
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: URL
URL

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A first indication of type of video recorded.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: género de los vídeos
video genre

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The zip code of the postal address of a person or organization.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: código postal
zip code

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: ISLRN
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ISLRN
International Standard Language Resource Number

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Used to bring persons and organizations (in whatever role they may have with regard to the resource, e.g., resource creator, IPR holder, etc.)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: actor
actor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the annotated part(s) of a resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: annotation info
informacion de las anotaciones

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on audio type/genre of the resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: audio classification info
información de la clasificación de los audios

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The name of the character encoding used in the resource or accepted by the tool/service.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: character encoding
codificación de los caracteres

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on character encoding of the resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: character encoding info
información de la codificación de los caracteres

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the person(s) that is/are responsible for providing further information regarding the resource
owl:Class.rdfs:label: contact person
persona de contacto

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the audio module of a corpus.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: corpus audio info
información de los ficheros de audio del corpus

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the image component of a resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: corpus image info
información de las imágenes del corpus

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on corpora of all media types.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: corpus info
información del corpus

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the text component of a resource.
corpus text info
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de los textos del corpus

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information required for n-gram resources; information can be provided both as regards features drawn from the source corpus (e.g. language coverage, size, format, domains etc.) and features pertaining to the n-gram output itself (e.g. range of n-grams, type of item included, etc.).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: corpus text ngram info
información de los n-gramas de los textos del corpus
Groups together information on the textNumerical component of a corpus. It is used basically for the textual representation of measurements and observations linked to sensorimotor recordings.
corpus text numerical info
información numérica de los textos del corpus

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the video component of a corpus.
información de los componentes audivisuales del corpus
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Corpus video info
información de los vídeos del corpus

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on all the documents reporting on various aspects of the resource (creation, usage etc.), published or unpublished; it is used in various places of the metadata schema depending on its role (e.g. usage report, validation report, annotation manual etc.).
document info
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de la documentación

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Refers to papers, manuals, reports etc. describing the resource
owl:Class.rdfs:label: documentación
documentation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on domains represented in the resource; can be repeated for parts of the resource with distinct domain
owl:Class.rdfs:label: domain info
información del dominio

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Information on the linguistic levels covered by the resource (grammar or lexical/conceptual resource).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: encoding level
nivel de codificación

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the classification of the image corpus.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: image classification info
información de la clasificación de las imágenes

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the requirements set on the input resource of a tool or service.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de entrada
información de los requisitos de entrada
input info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together all information relevant to the image module of a language description (e.g. format, languages, size etc.), if there are any (e.g. for sign language grammars).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de las imágenes de las gramáticas
language description image info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on language descriptions (grammars).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de las gramáticas
language description info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together all information relevant to the text module of a language description (e.g. format, languages, size etc.); it is obligatory for all language descriptions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de los textos de la gramática
language description text info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of the language description
owl:Class.rdfs:label: language description type
tipo de gramática

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together all information relevant to the video parts of a language description (e.g. format, languages, size etc.), if there are any (e.g. for sign language grammars).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de los vídeos de la gramática
language description video info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the languages represented in the resource
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de las lenguas del recurso
language info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on language varieties occurred in the resource (e.g. dialects).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de las variedades del lenguaje
language variety info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Specifies the type of the language variety that occurs in the resource or is supported by a tool/service.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: language variety type
tipo de variedad de la lengua
ficheros de audio del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource audio

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the audio part of the lexical/conceptual resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de los ficheros de audio del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource audio info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the image part of the lexical/conceptual resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de las imágenes del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource image info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information specific to lexical/conceptual resources.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the textual part of the lexical/conceptual resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de los textos del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource text info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the video part of the lexical conceptual resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información audiovisual del recurso léxico conceptual
información de los vídeos del recurso léxico conceptual
lexical conceptual resource video info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on licences for the resource; can be repeated to allow for different modes of access and restrictions of use (e.g. free for academic use, on-a-fee basis for commercial use, download of a sample for free use etc.)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de la licencia del recurso
licence info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The license of use for the resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: licencia
license

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A way of classifying licences according to their conditions of use (CLARIN recommendation).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: categorización de las licencias
license category

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the resource includes one, two or more languages.
clasificación por número de lenguas
owl:Class.rdfs:label: linguality type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A more detailed account of the linguistic information contained in the lexical conceptual resource.
linguistic information
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información lingüística

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the metadata record itself.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de los metadatos
metadata info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on the requirements set on the output of a tool or service.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de los requisitos de salida
información de salida
output info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: size unit
unidad de medida del tamaño

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on text type/genre of the resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de la clasificación de los textos
text classification info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups information on the text format(s) of a resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de los formatos del texto
text format info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together elements required for the description of tools and services.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de herramientas y servicios
tool service info

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Groups together information on video genre of the resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: información de la clasificación de los vídeos
video classification info

owl:NamedIndividual.terms:description: Apertium RDF is the linked data version of the Apertium family of bilingual dictionaries. It covers 22 dictionaries currently.
owl:NamedIndividual.terms:title: Apertium RDF
